page.title: 01The Area as a Whole.
page.content: Although the area of this block is near the County Town of Stafford and Newport and is near motorway links to large conurbations, it is remarkable for its lack of urban and residential develop- ment in general. The survey revealed a dearth of amenities as the area is almost entirely made up of farmland. No large village is contained within the area, although part of Ranton is included in the north of the block. Although there are few amenities and no focal centre, community life seemed strong with most farming families knowing each other well.
